backend/main.mo: Main actor defining Channel, UserProfile, BaconCashRequest, Conversation, and ChatRoom types with persistent storage maps; includes authorization and blob storage mixins, and implements CRUD operations for channels, user profiles, Bacon Cash, AI conversations, and chat rooms with category management.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that adds chatRooms map to the actor state and initializes a default 'RockHog Lounge' chat room while preserving existing channels, user profiles, Bacon Cash, and conversation data.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting four high-confidence features for chat room functionality: React Query hooks (useChatRooms.ts), UI components (ChatRoomPage, ChatRoomList, MessageList), routing and navigation integration, and visual theming for the chat interface.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files including components for layout, navigation, authentication, channels, admin, adult content gating, AI chat, and the new chat room feature with purple-blue themed styling.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining light and dark theme variables for background, foreground, primary, secondary, muted, accent, destructive, border, and sidebar colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for RockHog TV application with root div and module script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with routes for browse, category, stream, creator studio, Bacon Cash, admin, contact, sign-up, AI chat, and chat room pages, wrapped in ThemeProvider with Toaster for notifications.
frontend/src/components/account/AccountS: Header widget displaying authenticated user's name and Bacon Cash balance with a 'Buy' button navigating to the purchase page.
Authorization wrapper component that shows AccessDeniedScreen unless the user is authenticated and has admin role, with loading state handling.
frontend/src/components/adult/AdultGateD: Modal dialog requiring age confirmation (18+) before accessing adult content, with warning alert and confirm/cancel actions.
frontend/src/components/adult/AdultRoute: A route guard component that displays an age verification dialog for adult content, redirecting users to home if they decline consent.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Displays an access denied screen with a shield icon, customizable message, and a button to return to the home page.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: A button component that handles Internet Identity authentication, toggling between login and logout states with loading indicators.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: A modal dialog that prompts new users to create their profile by entering a display name, initializing their account with zero balances.
frontend/src/components/auth/RoleGate.ts: A conditional rendering component that restricts content based on admin status or channel ownership permissions.
frontend/src/components/branding/BrandLo: Displays the RockHog TV logo and brand name as a clickable button that navigates to the home page.
frontend/src/components/branding/Categor: Renders category-specific icons from a predefined set of image assets based on the category name.
frontend/src/components/branding/HeroBan: Displays a full-width hero banner with background image, title, and description promoting the RockHog TV platform.
frontend/src/components/channels/Channel: A clickable card component displaying channel thumbnail, title, category badge, and description with hover effects.
A modal dialog form for creating or editing channels with fields for title, category, description, stream URL, and thumbnail upload.
Displays a responsive grid of channel cards with loading and empty state handling.
frontend/src/components/channels/Thumbna: Handles image file upload for channel thumbnails with progress tracking, preview display, and removal functionality.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatInput.t: A textarea input with send button for chat messages, supporting Enter to send and Shift+Enter for new lines.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatRoomLis: Displays a scrollable list of available chat rooms with selection highlighting and loading/error states.
frontend/src/components/chat/Conversatio: Displays a scrollable list of AI chat conversations with loading and empty states. Shows conversation previews with message counts and highlights the currently active conversation.
frontend/src/components/chat/MessageBubb: Renders individual chat message bubbles with avatars (Sparkles for AI, User icon for human). Styles messages differently based on sender with appropriate alignment and colors.
frontend/src/components/chat/MessageList: Displays chat room messages in a scrollable area with auto-scroll on new messages. Shows sender names, timestamps, and handles loading/error/empty states.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main application layout wrapper with header (logo, navigation, auth), footer (copyright, social links, Caffeine.ai attribution), and profile setup dialog. Includes streaming gradient background.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Prima: Primary navigation bar with category buttons (Music, Gaming, Sports, Horror, Adult), AI Chat, Chat Room, and Creator Studio (auth-required). Highlights active route.
frontend/src/components/player/StreamEmb: Embeds video streams from various sources (YouTube, Twitch, raw iframe/embed code). Handles URL parsing and displays error alert if no stream URL is provided.
frontend/src/components/share/ShareButto: Share button that uses Web Share API when available, otherwise falls back to clipboard copy. Shows appropriate icon (Share2 or Copy) and toast notifications.
frontend/src/game/baconOps/engine/ai.ts: Empty file, likely placeholder for BaconOps game AI logic.
frontend/src/game/baconOps/engine/consta: Empty file, likely placeholder for BaconOps game constants.
frontend/src/game/baconOps/engine/gameLo: Empty file, likely placeholder for BaconOps game loop implementation.
frontend/src/game/baconOps/engine/gameSt: Empty file, likely placeholder for BaconOps game state management.
frontend/src/game/baconOps/engine/render: Empty file, likely placeholder for BaconOps game rendering logic.
frontend/src/game/baconOps/engine/system: Empty file, likely placeholder for BaconOps game systems (ECS or similar).
Empty file, likely placeholder for BaconOps game type definitions.
frontend/src/game/baconOps/input/useDesk: Empty file, likely placeholder for BaconOps desktop keyboard/mouse controls hook.
frontend/src/game/baconOps/input/useTouc: Empty file, likely placeholder for BaconOps touch controls hook.
frontend/src/game/baconOps/input/Virtual: Empty file, likely placeholder for BaconOps virtual/touch controls component.
frontend/src/game/baconOps/ui/BaconOpsMa: Empty file, likely placeholder for BaconOps game main menu component.
frontend/src/game/baconOps/ui/Hud.tsx: Empty file, likely placeholder for BaconOps game HUD component.
frontend/src/game/baconOps/ui/RoundOverl: Empty file, likely placeholder for BaconOps round start/end overlay component.
frontend/src/game/baconOps/ui/StatsPanel: Empty file, likely placeholder for BaconOps game statistics panel component.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that manages the backend actor instance with Internet Identity authentication. Invalidates dependent queries when actor changes and handles admin token initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdultGate.ts: Hook for managing adult content consent using sessionStorage. Provides consent state, loading state, and methods to grant/revoke consent.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthz.ts: Authorization hooks that query caller's role and admin status from the backend actor. Depends on authenticated identity and actor availability.
frontend/src/hooks/useChatRooms.ts: React Query hooks for chat room operations: fetching all rooms, fetching room messages (with 2.5s polling), and posting messages with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useConversations.ts: React Query hooks for AI conversation management: fetching all conversations, fetching single conversation by ID, and storing conversations with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all backend operations including channels (CRUD), user profiles, Bacon Cash requests, conversations, and admin functions using the actor from useActor hook.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark themes, defining color schemes for UI components, bacon-ops styling, AI chat, and chat room appearances.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the root component with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers for state management and authentication.
frontend/src/pages/AdminBaconCashRequest: Admin-only page displaying all Bacon Cash purchase requests in a table with the ability to fulfill pending requests and view completion status.
frontend/src/pages/AIChatPage.tsx: AI chat interface with conversation management, rule-based response generation for RockHog TV topics, message history, and conversation persistence using backend storage.
frontend/src/pages/BaconOpsArenaPage.tsx: Empty file placeholder for the Bacon Ops Arena page component.
frontend/src/pages/BrowseHomePage.tsx: Main browsing page featuring a hero banner, category grid with icons for navigation, and a grid of recently added channels.
frontend/src/pages/BuyBaconCashPage.tsx: Page for authenticated users to request Bacon Cash purchases and view their request history with status badges. Displays current balance and provides a form to submit purchase requests that admins will process.
frontend/src/pages/CategoryPage.tsx: Displays all channels filtered by category with category icon and count. Wraps adult category content in AdultRouteGuard for age verification.
frontend/src/pages/ChatRoomPage.tsx: Chat room interface with sidebar for room selection and main area for messages and input. Requires authentication and user profile to post messages.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Simple contact page displaying owner email address with a mailto button. Shows email in a centered card layout.
frontend/src/pages/CreatorStudioPage.tsx: Dashboard for authenticated users to manage their channels with create, edit, and delete functionality. Displays channel cards with stream keys, RTMP URLs, and copy-to-clipboard buttons.
frontend/src/pages/SignUpPage.tsx: Sign-up page that initiates Internet Identity authentication and explains the secure blockchain-based auth system. Redirects authenticated users to home after 2 seconds.
frontend/src/pages/StreamDetailPage.tsx: Individual channel detail page with embedded stream player, channel metadata, and edit/delete controls for owners and admins. Wraps adult content in AdultRouteGuard.
frontend/src/utils/category.ts: Defines canonical category values, display labels, and utility functions for consistent category handling. Exports type-safe category constants and label mapping functions.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support and methods to clear parameters from URLs.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color tokens using OKLCH color space, container settings, border radius variables, custom animations (accordion), and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state document tracking 8 implemented features for RockHog TV streaming platform including category navigation, channel management, viewer browsing, adult content gating, Bacon Cash virtual currency, authentication via Internet Identity, and visual theming.
